meanings.definition: The state or quality of being pseudonymous.
meanings.sent1: Her pseudonymousness in online forums protected her privacy.
meanings.sent2: The pseudonymousness of the author made it difficult to determine their true identity.
meanings.sent3: The pseudonymousness of the mysterious blogger added an element of intrigue to their posts.
meanings.sent4: In a world of pseudonymousness, true connections can be hard to establish.
meanings.sent5: The pseudonymousness of the username made it memorable among the sea of online handles.

meanings.definition: The practice of using a pseudonym.
meanings.sent1: The pseudonymousness of the writer allowed them to explore different genres freely.
meanings.sent2: Many authors choose pseudonymousness when writing in multiple styles.
meanings.sent3: The pseudonymousness of the chef in the cooking show kept the audience guessing.
meanings.sent4: His pseudonymousness as a street artist added an air of mystery to his work.
meanings.sent5: The pseudonymousness of the singer created buzz and speculation among fans.
